title: Steve Jobs‘ Aaron Sorkin apologizes to Tim Cook. Sort of.
text:
Steve Jobs‘ Aaron Sorkin apologizes to Tim Cook. Sort of. 
Published By: CultOfMac.com - Today 
Steve Jobs writer Aaron Sorkin has been doing the media rounds as of late. Last night he appeared on Conan, where he made a kinda-sorta apo...
